title: Strategies to Improve Mobile Learning Intention for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary educational technology knowledge and core concepts of learning theories
context.additional_context: Course Focused on Pre-Service Teachers Analyzing Mobile Learning Acceptance Factors Among Adult Learners, Including Activities Exploring the Interaction Between the UTAUT Model and Personality Traits (Big Five)

learning_goals: Learners can explain how the four core variables of the UTAUT model (performance expectancy, effort expectancy, social influence, facilitating conditions) affect mobile learning usage intentions.
Learners can analyze the effect of agreeableness (AGB) among the Big Five personality traits on learning usage intentions, mediated by social influence (SI).
Learners can apply three mobile learning support strategies that reflect adult learner characteristics to real-world educational scenarios.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
